titleStmt.title: The historie of the holy vvarre; by Thomas Fuller, B.D. prebendarie of Sarum, late of Sidney Colledge in Cambridge
titleStmt.author: Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.

titleStmt.title: The historie of the holy vvarre; by Thomas Fuller, B.D. prebendarie of Sarum, late of Sidney Colledge in Cambridge
titleStmt.author: Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Buck, one of the printers to the Universitie of Cambridge [, and sold by John Williams, London],

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, with "sold by Iohn Williams at ye Crane in St. P. Church-yard" in imprint.
The first leaf bears "A declaration of the frontispice" signed: J.C., i.e. John Cleveland.
The engraved title page and map are signed by William Marshall.
The last 14 leaves contain a chronological table and an index.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Thomas Buck, one of the printers to the Universitie of Cambridge [
